Description: Leg-section of both the lid and lower portion a black basalt anthropoid sarcophagus; single column of incised Hieroglyphic text down the front.
Curator's comments: PM III (2); 290-1 cf. Zivie-Coche, Giza au premier millenaire (1991): 286-7, pl.47. Sharpe, S. Egyptian inscriptions from the British Museum and other sources, pl.30 [2].

See: A. J. Spencer, 'Observations on Some Egyptian Sarcophagi in the British Museum', in W. V. Davies (ed), Studies in Egyptian Antiquities: A Tribute to T. G. H. James (BM Occasional Paper 123, 1999), 13-21.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Col R W Howard Vyse
